comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content:
1LT Allen E. Hill's P-38 "Hill's Angels" of the 80th Fighter Squadron "Headhunters," 8th FG. "Hill's Angels" artwork adorned the left side of the gondola; Dopey ogling a pinup occupied the right side.

Hill was officially credited with nine confirmed aerial victories.

comment.author: 89986708@N06
comment._content: P-38J-10-LO S/N 42-67898 "Hill's Angels" of 1st Lt. Allen E. Hill, 80th FS/8th FG, Finschaffen, January 1944.
